summary:
Clone GECEM website using Vite + React + TailwindCSS.
- Replicate Landing Page (Hero, About, Team, Activities, Contact).
- Replicate 6 Subpages (Reuniones, Proyectos, Entrevistas, Recursos, Casos, Capacitaciones).
- Use Lucide React for icons.
- Use Tailwind for styling (exact classes extracted).
